hero.title: More Than an Exchange
hero.description: CambiaZo lets you give new life to your items while you exchange and donate for a more sustainable world. Join us!

features.title: About Us
features.subtitle: Discover who is responsible for making CambiaZo a reality.
features.about_text: CambiaZo is an innovative platform that allows people to exchange and donate items they no longer use. Our goal is to promote a more sustainable lifestyle, where every item has a purpose and a positive impact.

members.name: Ian Santisteban
members.desc: Ian has extensive experience in managing agile teams and optimizing processes.

members.name: Jeremy Quispe
members.desc: Jeremy specializes in strategic planning and coordination of technology projects.

members.name: Mathias Mendoza
members.desc: Mathias is a developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient solutions.

members.name: Joseph Huamani
members.desc: Joseph stands out for his skill in developing scalable and robust applications.

cards.title: Discover the advantages of being part of our community
cards.subtitle: Explore how you can exchange or donate items through our app.

exchange.title: Exchanges
exchange.desc: Access a reliable network where you can exchange goods quickly and safely.

donation.title: Donations
donation.desc: Help those who need it most by donating items in good condition that you no longer use.

principal.title: Sustainable Exchanges,
principal.desc: With CambiaZo, you can exchange, donate, and connect with users to promote a sustainable lifestyle, where the value of each item keeps flowing.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Exchange and donate in a safe environment.

items.title: Items
items.desc: Wide variety of items from different categories.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Connect with users who share and drive change.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.desc: Reduce your carbon footprint with every exchange.

ongs.title: Our Partner NGOs
ongs.desc: We have a very wide variety of charitable organizations united for sustainable development and contributing to most of Peruvian society.

plans.title: Enhance Your Experience
plans.desc: Explore our Premium plans for exclusive access, advanced features, and priority support. Join and enhance your experience today!

contact.title: Join CambiaZo!
contact.desc: Stay up to date and contribute to our sustainability mission. Subscribe to receive our latest news.
contact.privacy: All data is protected by our Privacy Policy. Read the Terms and Conditions here.
